name: Mahjong Riichi Multiplayer
description: Japanese mahjong, also known as Riichi mahjong, is a 4 player tabletop game based on the chinese original mahjong. Compete against individuals from all over the world in the online multiplayer mode. Build sequences and tripplets within your hand and complete your hand faster than your opponents!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP1 Processor: 1.0 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 800 MB available space
